name: dali arcade
description:
a 3D infinite runner pulling from the works of salvador dalí from 1927. mechanics inspired by the first and second of his works listed below.

controls: A and D or arrow keys 

salvador dalí works used: 

  • self-portrait being duplicated into three
  • honey is sweeter than blood
  • harlequin
  • head of a woman
  • apparatus and hand
  • mannequin

submitted for the gaming like it's 1927 jam. 

made by Annie (visibleworld) and Fiona (mariopartygod)
